co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block

Class BlockHasEnergy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.Block
      • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockHasMeasure
        • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockHasEnergy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockBattery

    public abstract class BlockHasEnergy
extends BlockHasMeasure
    A block that has some measure of energy, like an energy battery or something. This is a base block for blocks that have an Energy measure.
    Author:
    Niadel
